page.title: 08VILLAGE CLUB
page.content: The Village club was donated by Mr Trufusis the population of Flushing each donated one brick towards the building .They pay a rent of Â£12 a year and has been run since 1926 .The club consisits of four main rooms, snooker room, a small hall for village meetings, a kitchen for meals for elderly folk, a main hall for school plays etc.The club is used by many organizations and the village activitys. The follow is a list of activities in the club: Keep Fit Meetings Judo Cubs School PE Scouts Aerobics Brownies Gymnastics Guides School Plays Woman's Institute Christmas Pantomimes
